record.title: UNANIMOUS CONSENT AGREEMENT--H.R. 4156

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I ask unanimous consent that when the Senate begins the rule XIV procedure with respect to the House bridge bill regarding funding for Iraq and Afghanistan, that it be considered as having been initiated on Wednesday, November 14.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, I suggest the absence of a quorum.

record.chair: The clerk will call the roll.
The legislative clerk proceeded to call the roll.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the order for the quorum call be rescinded.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
